meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the arum family, typically having shiny, dark green leaves.
meanings.sent1: The philodendron in the corner of the room brightens up the space.
meanings.sent2: I watered the philodendron in the morning to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: The philodendron seemed to wave at me as I walked by.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature was like a philodendron, growing stronger every day.
meanings.sent5: The philodendron's leaves glistened in the sunlight, like emeralds in a treasure chest.
